Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive/Monument Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Wakeforest Drive and Monument Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection of Wakeforest Drive and Monument Avenue is relatively uneventful being at the easternmost point in town. The large City Walls on the east side of the road mark the boundaries of the vast city. On the southwest corner, you can see the Obidian Community Housing Complex where most of the citizens who need to live inside Oceancrest live.
